content: I'm so excited to start meal planning and cooking! I think I'll start by planning out my meals for the week and making a grocery list. I've been relying too much on takeout and dining out, and I know it's not only expensive but also unhealthy. I'll try to start with simple recipes and gradually move to more complex dishes. I'll also look into meal planning apps and cookbooks to help me get started. Thanks for the tips!
